text: Galopina is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is found in Malawi, Mozambique, Zimbabwe, South Africa, Lesotho, and Swaziland. ==Species== *Galopina aspera *Galopina circaeoides *Galopina crocyllioides *Galopina tomentosa ==References== Category:Rubiaceae genera
title: Galopina
